name: Fickle Forest
description:
Create a stable ecosystem by choosing what creatures will live in the fickle forest. Try and get a high score in Fickle Forest mode or explore the system with the Sandbox.

Created for Ludum Dare 49 in 72 Hours.

Art by BlueheadViking and Joshrl

Gameplay by jaberwocky33 stbelousov and n00begon

Made in Godot
